items.sentence: I want to have this cassette recorder fixed.

No matter what you say, I'll do what I want.
I searched everywhere, but I didn't find it.
What's your favorite kind of salad dressing?
Do you think that your sources are reliable?
Tom was as thin as a rail when he was a kid.
Everybody stopped talking and looked at Tom.
Tom was anxious about his children's health.
Tom got angry when I said that he was lying.
Tom promised to meet Mary at the restaurant.
How much money do you think has been wasted?

I teamed up with Tom for our school project.
There will always be these kind of problems.
That village is the enemy's last stronghold.
Don't count your chickens before they hatch.
Don't disturb her. She is at work right now.

I couldn't stop myself from longing for her.
You'd better consult an attorney beforehand.
Tom told me that I'm the only one he trusts.
I suggest we stay home and watch television.
I have a ball-point pen, but I want another.

It's about time for you to get back to work.
This is a picture of me when I was your age.
This is really starting to freak me out now.

I haven't taken any pictures in a long time.
Everybody says I'm a chip off the old block.
Everybody here except you is from Australia.
If you have some time, check out my website.

Tom isn't used to this kind of cold weather.
